member.name: T:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile
member.summary: Projectile class provides interface for MissileController objects to access to properties about the projectile It also retrieves necessary movement vector or position vector and moves the carrier object appropriately It is also responsible for handling the collisions and target checks

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.NearEnough
member.summary: The near enough distance constant which indicates that a missile will consider itself reached to a target point

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.CastRotation
member.summary: Rotation of the caster Character when the projectile stage began.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.Make(UnityEngine.GameObject,Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController,Quark.Spells.Cast,Quark.TargetUnion)
member.summary:
This function creates a new projectile object from a prefab and a controller in a context towards a target.
The created projectile will immediately start travelling towars its target.
member.param: The prefab of a Projectile. The prefab shouldn't contain a Projectile component.
A controller object to control the Projectile instance.
Context to create the Projectile instance in.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.Context
member.summary: The context this Projectile travels in.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.InitPosition
member.summary: Gets the initial position for this missile.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.Target
member.summary:
Current target point of this Projectile instance.
The target may update.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile.InitialTime
member.summary: The time in seconds that this Projectile instance was created.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.CalculateInitial(Quark.TargetUnion,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: This method should calculate the initial position of the Projectile object.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Control
member.summary:
This method controls the projectile object.
There are primarily 2 ways of controlling a projectile:
- Calculating the change of position every frame. - Calculating the absolute position every frame.
This method gets the appropriate property and updates the position of the Projectile by default.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.HasReached
member.summary: This method determines whether the projectile arrived it its destination, and is ready for destruction.
member.returns: Whether the projectile should be destroyed.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Set(Quark.Projectiles.Projectile)
member.summary: Set the Projectile object of this ProjectileController.

member.name: M:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.ValidateHit(Quark.Targetable)
member.summary: This method should determine whether a hit to a Targetable object is valid or not.
member.returns: Whether the hit is valid or not.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Type
member.summary: Gets the position update type for the missile

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Projectile
member.summary: The Projectile component this controller belongs to.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Movement
member.summary: Calculates the change in the position of the projectile in this frame.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Position
member.summary: Calculates the absolute position of the projectile in this frame.
member.value: The absolute position, relative to the starting point.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.CurrentPosition
member.summary: Gets current projectile position

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Target
member.summary: Gets the target position of the projectile.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.InitialPosition
member.summary: Gets the initial position of the projectile.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Alive
member.summary: Gets the time in seconds since the projectile was created.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Distance
member.summary: Gets the distance from the beginning position to the current projectile position.

member.name: P:Quark.Projectiles.ProjectileController.Context
member.summary: The context this ProjectileController works in.

member.name: T:Quark.Projectiles.ControlType
member.summary: This enumeration represents how a ProjectileController calculates motion of a Projectile.

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.ControlType.Movement
member.summary: Projectile calculates change from the previous position of the Projectile every frame.

member.name: F:Quark.Projectiles.ControlType.Absolute
member.summary: Projectile calculates absolute position relative to the beginning position.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Interval
member.summary: This field stores the interval of calling the Tick method in seconds.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Duration
member.summary: This field stores the total duration of this Buff instance.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Continuous
member.summary: This flag determines whether the Tick method should be called every frame or not.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TicksWhileSuspended
member.summary: This flag determines whether this Buff ticks while its Possessor Character is suspended or not.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.MaxStacks
member.summary: This field stores the maximum stack count of this Buff.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.CurrentStacks
member.summary: This field stores the current stack count of this Buff.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff.StackBehavior
member.summary: This field stores the stacking behavior of this Buff. See

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.MakeID(Quark.Buffs.Buff,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Makes an Identifier from a Buff and Cast instances

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.MakeID(Quark.Buffs.Buff,System.String)
member.summary: Makes an Identifier from a Buff and an identifier for a Cast context

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.SetContext(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Sets the Cast context where this Buff runs in

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._posessionTime
member.summary: This variable is stored for calculating the alive time of the Buff instances

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._lastTick
member.summary: This variable is stored for checking whether the Tick method should be called or not in a given frame

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._terminated
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff got terminated in the last Tick

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Terminate
member.summary: Immediately terminates this Buff. Termination assures no other Tick will take place in this instance.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.ResetBeginning
member.summary: Resets the possession time of this Buff, practically resetting its lifetime

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Tick
member.summary: This function controls the state of the buff for whether it should call the OnTick function in this frame or not and also it checks if it has completed its lifespan or not

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.ShouldDispose
member.summary: This method determines whether this Buff instance should get disposed in the current frame.
member.returns: Whether this buff should get disposed.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Register
member.summary: Register proper events to the Messenger. This method should not contain any gameplay related logic Refer to the OnPossess() for gameplay logic on possession

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Deregister
member.summary: Deregister pre registered events from the messenger.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Possess(Quark.Character)
member.summary: Begin the posession logic of this Buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnPossess
member.summary: This event handler is called right after the owning BuffContainer possesses this buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnStack
member.summary: This event is raised when an existing Buff is attached again

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnTick
member.summary: Handles the tick event

member.summary: Executes the finalization logic of this buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnTerminate
member.summary: Executes the termination logic of this buff

member.summary: Checks whether this Buff is tagged with the given string or not.

member.summary: This field determines whether this Buff should be hidden or not.

member.summary: The context this Buff resides in.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Identifier
member.summary: Returns this Buffs identifier

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.LifeRatio
member.summary: This ratio indicates the rate of its alive time to its total duration

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Alive
member.summary: The time span in seconds where this Buff was running

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.CleanedUp
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff is ready to be garbage collected

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.PossessEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff is first possessed

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.StackEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when another instance of this Buff is attached to the possessor

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TickEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied on every interval

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.DoneEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff finishes its life time successfully

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TerminateEffects
member.summary: These effeccts are applied when this Buff terminates (fails finish its life time)

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.DoneConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should be done

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TerminateConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should terminate

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Tags
member.summary: Stores the static tags of this buff.

member.name: T:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior
member.summary: This enumeration dictates how a given Buff should respond in a stacking situation

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.ResetBeginning
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should reset its possession time.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.IncreaseStacks
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should increase its stack count.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.Nothing
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff shouldn't respond.

member.summary: This method finds the given Buff in this container by its Identifier.

member.name: E:Quark.Buffs.BuffContainer.BuffDetached
member.summary: This event is raised whenever a Buff was detached from this container.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.MakeID(Quark.Spells.Spell,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Generates an identifier for a given Spell in a given Context.

member.summary: Generates an identifier for a given Spell casted by a given Character.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.SetContext(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Introduce the Cast context which is invoking this Spell instance.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CanInvoke
member.summary: This method determines whether this Spell can be casted in the current Context.
member.returns: Whether this Spell can be casted.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnInvoke
member.summary: Executes the spell cast beginning logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnTargetingDone
member.summary: Executes the Targeting Done logic of this Spell on every possible target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCastingBegan
member.summary: Executes the Casting Begin logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCasting
member.summary: Executes the Casting logic of this Spell without a target. This method is called every frame while casting.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnCastDone
member.summary: Executes the Casting Done logic of this Spell on every possible target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnInterrupt
member.summary: Executes the Interruption logic of this Spell without a target.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnTravel(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Executes the Travel logic on thge position of the projectile this stage was triggered from.

members.member:
Executes the Hit logic on the given point for this Spell.
Target of the hit.>

Executes the Hit logic on the given Character for this Spell.
Target of the hit.>

member.summary: Executes the Hit logic on the given Targetable for this Spell.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnMiss
member.summary: Executes the Miss logic for this Spell.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnFinal
member.summary: Executes the ClearEffects then purges itself from the Cast context it is associated with

member.summary: Collects a projectile which were created by this spell

member.name: F:Quark.Spells.Spell._onAirMissileCount
member.summary: This field stores the current travelling missiles originating from this Spell.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CreateProjectiles
member.summary: Invokes necessary projectiles for this spell

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsTagged(System.String)
member.summary: This method determines whether this Spell is tagged with a certain string or not.
member.returns: Whether this spell is tagged or not.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDuration
member.summary: Gets or Sets the duration of the cast.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnCasting logic to run while this Spell is being casted.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnTravel logic to run while a projectile belonging to this Spell is traveling.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Name
member.summary: Name of the Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Identifier
member.summary: Identifier of this Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetForm
member.summary: Gets the target form of this spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetMacro
member.summary: Gets the target macro of this Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.ProjectileObject
member.summary: This property stores the GameObject for the projectiles of this Spell. If this property returns null, the Projectile stage of this Spell will be skipped. Necessary components will be added by Quark upon instantiation on the projectiles.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Controller
member.summary: This property stores the ProjectileController for the projectiles of this Spell.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsInstant
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell is instant.
member.value: true if this spell is instant; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsProjectiled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell invokes projectiles.
member.value: true if this instance has projectiles; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Context
member.summary: The context this Spell instance resides in.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InvokeCondition
member.summary:
The invoke conditions. Conditions in this collection are checked to determine whether this Spell can be casted.
Possible Targets: + Caster Character

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InvokeEffects
member.summary:
The begin effects. Effects within this list are applied with the caster Character object argument when the castdata is initialized
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetingDoneEffects
member.summary:
The targeting done effects. Effects within this list are applied with each of the target Character objects and Vector objects, depending on the type of the spell
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingBeginEffects
member.summary:
The casting began effects Effects within this list are applied after targeting done and casting began, these effects are not executed for instant spells
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingEffects
member.summary:
The casting effects Effects within this list are applied while the casting occurs
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDoneEffects
member.summary:
The casting done effects Effects within this list are applied when the casting successfully finishe
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InterruptEffects
member.summary:
The interruption effects Effects within this list are applied if the spell gets interrupted either by the caster or other Character
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelEffects
member.summary:
The traveling effects Effects within this list are applied while the projectiles of this Spell are traveling
Possible Targets: + Points the projectiles pass from while travelling.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.HitEffects
member.summary:
The on-hit effects Effects within this list are applied when a successful hit occurs.
Possible Targets: + Target Characters + Target Targetables + Target Points + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.MissEffects
member.summary:
The spell miss effects Effects within this list are applied when a projectile gets destroyed without hitting any characters.
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.ClearEffects
member.summary:
The finalizing effects Effects within this list are applied just before the spell gets collected by the GC.
Possible Targets: + Void

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Tags
member.summary: This property stores the static tags of this Spell.

member.name: F:Quark.Spells.Cast.HitCount
member.summary: The total hit count in this context.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Cast.PrepareCast(Quark.Character,Quark.Spells.Spell)
member.summary: Prepares a new instance of with the specified caster and spell.
member.param: The instance of the spell to be cast.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Cast.Invoke
member.summary: Begin the casting logic.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Cast.BeginTargeting
member.summary: Begin targeting logic

member.summary: Notice this context for an error in targeting.

member.summary: BeginTargeting done logic.

member.name: F:Quark.Spells.Cast._interrupted
member.summary: This flag stores whether the current Cast instance has been interrupted or not

member.summary: This field stores the last time the Casting logic of the spell being casted was executed

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Cast.Interrupt
member.summary: Interrupt this Cast instance.

member.summary: Clears this contexts internal references.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this context is Item sourced.
member.value: true if non Spell; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Cast.Caster
member.summary: Gets the caster.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Cast.CastTime
member.summary: Gets the cast time.
member.value: The time past since the beginning of the cast.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Cast.CastPercentage
member.summary: Gets the cast percentage.

member.summary: Targeting stage.

member.summary: Casting stage.

member.summary: Cast has successfully finalized.

member.name: F:Quark.Spells.Stages.Failed
member.summary: Cast has failed.

member.summary: Applies this effect on the specified target Character.

member.summary: Applies this effect on the specified target Vector3.

member.name: T:Quark.EffectCollection
member.summary: This class is designed for containing, mutating and running some effects It is useful for storing event handling effects The family of Run functions return the instance itself so the running of the effects on multiple target types can be serialized like: Container.Run().Run(character).Run(point)... etc.

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new effect collection

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Add(Quark.Effect)
member.summary: Add a new effect to this collection

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.AddRange(Quark.EffectCollection)
member.summary: Add multiple effects from another collection.

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Run the effects contained in this collection with no target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(UnityEngine.Vector3,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Point target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Character,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Character target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Targetable,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Targetable target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(UnityEngine.Vector3[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Point targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Character[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Character targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Targetable[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Targetable targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.TargetCollection,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.op_Addition(Quark.EffectCollection,Quark.EffectCollection)
member.summary: This operator adds 2 EffectCollection instances by adding the Effects in the right hand side operand to the left hand side operand.

member.name: P:Quark.EffectCollection.Count
member.summary: The count of the Effects in this collection.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.Suspend
member.summary: This method suspends this Character, practically disabling it.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.Continue
member.summary: This method continues this Character if it was suspended.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.Configure
member.summary: Configure this Character.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.Destruction
member.summary: Handle the destruction of this character

member.name: M:Quark.Character.GetAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the belonging to this Character with the given tag

member.name: M:Quark.Character.GetStat(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the belonging to this Character with the given tag

member.name: M:Quark.Character.CanCast(Quark.Spells.Spell)
member.summary: Determines whether the given can be casted by this Character.
member.returns: Boolean representing whether this Character can cast the given Spell or not.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.AddCast(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Add the given context to this character.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.ClearCast(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Removes the given context from this character.

member.name: M:Quark.Character.GetBuff(Quark.Buffs.Buff)
member.summary: If a buff with the given type exists on this Character, it will return the correct instance on the Character, otherwise it will return null.
member.returns: The buff instance being carried by this Character.
member.param: Example of the Buff to find. Only types should match.

member.name: P:Quark.Character.IsSuspended
member.summary: This property stores whether this Character is suspended or not.

member.name: P:Quark.Character.ConfigurationEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Character is instantiated.

member.name: P:Quark.Character.DestructionEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when the GameObject this Character belongs is destroyed.

member.name: P:Quark.Character.Casts
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of the casts this Character is casting

member.name: P:Quark.Character.HasCast
member.summary: This property determines whether this Character is casting currently.

member.name: P:Quark.Character.Buffs
member.summary: Returns a readonly collection of the Buffs being carried by this Character

member.name: E:Quark.Character.CharacterDestroyed
member.summary: This event is raised after the Character component is destroyed

member.name: E:Quark.Character.BuffAttached
member.summary: This event is raised when a new Buff is attached to this Character

member.name: E:Quark.Character.BuffDetached
member.summary: This event is raised when a Buff is detached from this Character

member.name: E:Quark.Character.StatManipulated
member.summary: This event is raised when a Stat of this Character is manipulated

member.name: T:Quark.QuarkConfig
member.summary: This class is used for configuring a Quark game. It includes the base Attributes and Stats and the common interruption conditions.

member.name: T:Quark.QuarkMain
member.summary: QuarkMain is the singleton object which starts the default Quark subroutines

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.Initialize
member.summary: This method is used for initializing this QuarkMain instance.

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.Awake
member.summary: This method is called from Unity right after it is instantiated.

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.Update
member.summary: This method is called every frame from Unity. We use it to broadcast the Update event.

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.GetDaemon``1
member.summary: Finds a daemon by its type.
member.returns: Active daemon. If the daemon is not present, it is null.

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.AddDaemon(Quark.Utilities.Daemon)
member.summary: Adds a new daemon to the game.

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.TerminateDaemon(Quark.Utilities.Daemon)
member.summary: Terminates the given daemon, and removes it from the game.

member.name: F:Quark.QuarkMain._headRef
member.summary: A weak reference to the singleton QuarkMain object. It is accessed via a weak reference so that it will be garbage collected after the GameObject it is attached to is destroyed

member.name: M:Quark.QuarkMain.GetInstance
member.summary: Gets the singleton QuarkMain instance.

member.name: P:Quark.QuarkMain.Configuration
member.summary: This property stores the configuration for this game.

member.name: P:Quark.QuarkMain.IsPresent
member.summary: This property determines whether a QuarkMain object is already instantiated or not.

member.name: M:Quark.Interaction.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new effect collection

member.name: M:Quark.Interaction.Add(Quark.Attributes.AttributeModifier)
member.summary: Add a new interaction to this collection.

member.name: M:Quark.Interaction.Calculate(Quark.Character)
member.summary: Calculates the current value of this Interaction for a given Character

member.name: M:Quark.Interaction.DeepCopy
member.summary: Deep copies this collection by recreating it attribute and stat -wise. This function will not preserve any event listener or the current state of the states

member.name: T:Quark.Symbol
member.summary:
This class is the building block of expressions.
It can be an interaction, constant or other custom calculation such as another expression.

member.name: T:Quark.ConstantSymbol
member.summary: This class represents only a constant value.

member.name: T:Quark.InteractionSymbol
member.summary:
This class represents an attribute interaction of a given source.
It depends either on the caster or target depending on the source, and the value it yields is the interaction result.

member.name: M:Quark.Expression.Add(System.Single)
member.summary: Adds a constant symbol to this expression.

member.name: M:Quark.Expression.Add(Quark.Symbol)
member.summary: Adds an arbitrary symbol to this expression.

member.name: M:Quark.Expression.Add(Quark.Source,System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds an attribute interaction to this expression.

member.name: M:Quark.Expression.Execute(Quark.Character,Quark.Character)
member.summary: Executes the expression and returns the calculated value.
